Articles.Content:
Hey, Pinkieseb here!

I know you've probably heard this all the time, people asking for ideas. Im gonna join that and ask the KSP community, I make videos Here Im just an in-general gamer. But so far out of all the games I've recorded KSP has been my favorite! But im running out of ideas, my 4th KSP video hasnt uploaded yet, in that video i make a space station (big one) and fly planes around. My skills in this game are limited, but I still need ideas. I can get to the mun and orbit/land easily. Coming home is the hard part xD Challenges for suggestions would be nice, because I can get much better at the game with those! So yes, please give me some challenges!

But please, I dont wanna go interplanetary just yet

BIG LINK TO MY YOUTUBE HERE

Start by launching a medium or large rocket carrying many small probes... Once in orbit fire those probes and send them to other planets, Duna for example.

If you're making a youtube let's play out of KSP launch some probes to other planets or other moons, then work on getting a ship to orbit those planets then eventually land. If you have mods I've seen a lot of people use B9 parts to make an SSTO ( single stage to orbit ) go to Duna and land. Of course though if you don't have the best skills as you mentioned Eve may be a better choice for its thicker atmosphere. Chutes deploy a lot sooner and makes it easier but harder to leave the planet.

Edited July 21, 2013 by 7499275

Hmmm, thanks! I'll try that probe thing. Kinda confused about it, but anywho, I'll try...

On another note! I just made it to the Mun in the Kerbal X

Congrats on the landing.

If your confused I can try to clear it up.

You've been to the Mun, now to start going to other planets, I've seen people use a large rocket to get into Kerbins orbit, at the top have beams or girders that are connected to decouplers, on each of the decouplers have a probe with an ant engine.

Couldnt land it haha, its stuck in orbit forever with no fuel haha

Ok that makes sence! Thanks
